channel.title: [508] Player position command
channel.description:
Well, I'm fairly new to 508's and everything so I already have a question. xD
I need to get a player position command like how on 317's it's ::mypos - the one that prints your players coords in the chatbox. I've noticed that 508's are different so I really have no idea what it is like for it. The only command tutorials I can find are about giving items or experience by a command. There's nothing on the forums about this command when I searched so.. Please help.

item.title: [508] Player position command
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

[quote=“rain1994, post:7, topic:326046”][quote author=magekid990 link=topic=422463.msg3277518#msg3277518 date=1279645948]
the command shud alerady be in the 508 source type ::coords for you pos
[/quote]

wow it was in there thanks. idk how i missed it i had looked through the commands 4 times lol[/quote] yw cheer$ ;D

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Player position command
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. Nice Gravedig

  2. Change the other line to: p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Your X Coordinate is: " + p.absX +”. Your Y Coordinate is: " + p.absY + “.”);

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Player position command
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

if(cmd[0].equals("mypos") { p.frames.sendMessage("Your X Coordinate is: " + p.absX +". Your Y Coordinate is: " + p.absY + "."); }

Read full topic
